entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 11:57 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: ENE 50 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
